page.title: 19STANION MAY DAY (CONT.)
page.content: Maypole dances: { Entry,Taking {Ribbons,Circling,Single Plaiting, {Spider's Web,The Tent,Exit. Infants Dance Drama: {There was a {princess long ago.} Morris Dances: {Shepherds'Hay, } {Fool's Jig,The Bromsborough Heath {Morris Dance. } Girl's Clog Dance:{The Stanion Clog {Dance} Country dances:{ Durham Reel, {Thady-U-Ganda,Brighton Camp,Cumberland {Square Eight. The May Queen's Ribbon Dance. Country Dance:{Pat-a-cake polka}(all) Exit. Children leave the playground for their May Day tea to the song { {Glad that I live } Attendants:Pippa Morgan,Naomi Jacques, Sandra Spencer,Ruth Buckingham,Nicole Mckenna,Claire Sturgess Flower Girls: Rachel Chudley and Louise Singlehurst
